commandDescription.en-US: Tells you what are the features I offer or what they do
commandDescription.fr: Te dit quelles sont les fonctionnalités que je propose ou ce qu'elles font
commandDescription.pt-BR: Te diz quais recursos eu apresento ou o que eles fazem

help.en-US:
Type $<commandMention> to know what are the features I offer
Type $<commandMention> `$<featureOptionDescription>` to know what `$<featureOptionDescription>` does
help.fr:
Tape $<commandMention> pour savoir quelles sont les fonctionnalités que je propose
Tape $<commandMention> `$<featureOptionDescription>` pour savoir ce qu'`$<featureOptionDescription>` fait
help.pt-BR:
Digite $<commandMention> pra saber quais são os recursos que apresento
Digite $<commandMention> `$<featureOptionDescription>` pra saber o que `$<featureOptionDescription>` faz

reply.en-US:
Hey $<memberMention>, there you are!
I can give you some advice about this feature:
$<featureList>
reply.fr:
Ah $<memberMention>, tu es là !
Je peux te donner des conseils sur cette fonctionnalité :
$<featureList>
reply.pt-BR:
Opa $<memberMention>, aí está você!
Eu posso te dar algumas dicas sobre esse recurso:
$<featureList>

bareReply.en-US:
Hey $<memberMention>, there you are!
I can give you some advice about the server:
$<featureList>
bareReply.fr:
Ah $<memberMention>, tu es là !
Je peux te donner des conseils sur le serveur :
$<featureList>
bareReply.pt-BR:
Opa $<memberMention>, aí está você!
Eu posso te dar algumas dicas sobre o servidor:
$<featureList>

noFeatureReply.en-US:
Hey $<memberMention>, there you are!
I can not give you any advice about this feature.
noFeatureReply.fr:
Ah $<memberMention>, tu es là !
Je ne peux te donner aucun conseil sur cette fonctionnalité.
noFeatureReply.pt-BR:
Opa $<memberMention>, aí está você!
Eu não posso te dar nenhuma dica sobre esse recurso.
